mapper.select: select distinct tbl_document.document_code as documentCode, tbl_document.document_type_code as documentTypeCode, tbl_document.document_title as documentTitle, tbl_document.document_content as documentContent, tbl_document.emp_code as empCode, to_char(tbl_document.document_date, 'YYYYMMDD HH:MI') as documentDate, tbl_document_type.document_type_name as documentTypeName, tbl_document_sign.sign_yn as progress from tbl_document join tbl_document_type on tbl_document.document_type_code = tbl_document_type.document_type_code join tbl_document_sign on tbl_document_sign.emp_code = tbl_document.emp_code where tbl_document.document_type_code != 'pj' and tbl_document.emp_code = #{empCode}

select distinct tbl_document.document_code as documentCode, tbl_document.document_type_code as documentTypeCode, tbl_document.document_title as documentTitle, to_char(tbl_document.document_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') as documentDate, tbl_emp.emp_name as empName, tbl_document_type.document_type_name as documentTypeName, tbl_document_sign.sign_yn as progress, (select count(*) from tbl_files where document_code = tbl_document.document_code) as fileCount from tbl_document join tbl_emp on tbl_document.emp_code = tbl_emp.emp_code join tbl_document_type on tbl_document_type.document_type_code = tbl_document.document_type_code join tbl_document_sign on tbl_document.document_code = tbl_document_sign.document_code where tbl_document.emp_code = #{empCode}
select to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')||lpad(seq_document.nextVal,8,'0') as document_code from dual
select to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')||lpad(seq_spending.nextVal,4,'0') as spending_code from dual
select DISTINCT document_type_name as documentTypeName, document_type_code as documentTypeCode from tbl_document_type

select document_code as documentCode, emp_code as empCode, document_title as documentTitle, document_content as documentContent, document_date as documentDate, document_type_code as documentTypeCode from tbl_document where document_code = #{documentCode} and document_type_code = #{documentTypeCode}
select file_no as fileNo, document_code as documentCode, file_name as fileName, file_fath as fileFath from tbl_file where document_code = #{documentCode}
select document_code as documentCode, emp_code as empCode, sign_yn as signYn, document_seq as documentSeq from tbl_document_sign where document_code = #{documentCode}
select document_type_code as documentTypeCode, document_type_name as documentTypeName from tbl_document_type where document_type_code != 'pj'

select document_code as documentCode, emp_code as empCode, sign_yn as signYn, document_seq as documentSeq, emp_name as empName, rank_name as empRank from tbl_document_sign join tbl_emp using(emp_code) join tbl_rank using(rank_code) where document_code=#{_string} order by document_seq

select document_code as documentCode, emp_code as empCode, emp_name as empName, document_title as documentTitle, document_content as documentContent, document_date as documentDate, document_type_code as documentTypeCode, document_type_name as documentTypeName from tbl_document join tbl_emp using(emp_code) join tbl_document_type using(document_type_code) where document_code = #{documentCode}

select spending_code as spendingCode, spending_cost as spendingCost, spending_day as spendingDay, spending_content as spendingContent, document_code as documentCode from tbl_spending where document_code =#{_string}
select file_no as fileNo, document_code as documentCode, file_name as fileName, file_path as filePath from tbl_files where document_code =#{_string}
select annual_start as startDay, annual_end as endDay, document_code as documentCode from tbl_annual where document_code =#{_string}
select document_code as documentCode, half_day as vacDate, Half_type as halfTime from tbl_half where document_code=#{_string}
select emp_code as empCode, document_code as documentCode from tbl_reference where document_code=#{_string}

select document_code as documentCode, business_to as businessTo, business_perpose as businessPurpose, business_start as businessStart, business_end as businessEnd from tbl_business_trip where document_code=#{_string}
select to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddHHmmss')||lpad(seq_estimate.nextVal,4,'0') as estimateCode from dual

SELECT team_code AS teamCode, team_name AS teamName, SUM(price*people) AS price, SUM(people) AS people, SUM(work_days) AS WorkDays FROM tbl_estimate JOIN tbl_rank USING (rank_code) JOIN tbl_team USING (team_code) WHERE document_code = #{_string} GROUP BY team_code, team_name
select document_code as documentCode, team_code as teamCode, team_name as teamName from tbl_cooperate join tbl_team using(team_code) where document_code=#{_string}
